### Question 1
```{r}
par(mfrow = c(2,2))
wn04 <- arima.sim(n = 100, 
                  model = list(),
                  sd = sqrt(4))
spec.pgram(wn04,log = "no",main = "no filter")
spec.pgram(wn04,spans = c(5), log = "no",main = "m = 5")
spec.pgram(wn04,spans = c(15), log = "no",main = "m = 15")
spec.pgram(wn04,spans = c(7,5), log = "no",main = "m = 7, n = 5")
```
